tool_description: NADA Vehicle Pricing delivers valuation data for specified used vehicles based on VIN, including vehicle make/model/body style and values for retail, trade-in and loan.
name: NADA Vehicle Pricing
title: NADA Vehicle Pricing

api_list.name: /GetBody
/GetYears
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nada-vehicle-pricing.p.rapidapi.com/GetYears"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nada-vehicle-pricing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
